title: Sex in the Work Place To Who Has the Better Freestyle
itunes:title: Sex in the Work Place To Who Has the Better Freestyle
description:
Friday 10/13- Today on the show Dj Envy and Angela Yee was broadcasting live from Miami for the Revolt Music Conference while Charlamagne relaxed back at the studio. It is Freaky Freaky Friday and after one of the producers found a used condom in their studio we asked the audience if they ever had sex in the work place. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to sheriff Steve Prador because of the comments he made about why he wants to keep prisoners for free labor, better yet initiating modern day 'slavery'. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines and asked the audience who they thought had the better freestyle at the BET Hip Hop Awards Eminem or Mysonne.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
